website_summaries.verdict: Going to the beach, walking around an amusement park, or doing any casual activity that involves lots of time on your feet should be accompanied by lightweight and comfy casual shoes. Merrell Jungle Ayers Mocs are precisely that. The uppers are soft, the bottoms are cushioned, and the build is light.Merrell hit it out of the ballpark when it made these. The slip-on construction is simply convenient, and you can wear the shoes with or without socks. One huge plus is that these kicks are durable and wear well.
pros: Merrell Jungle Ayers Moc shoes are perfect for the summer season because of their lightweight and breathable build, plenty of testers have stated
Many users say that these are one of the most comfortable pairs of shoes they’ve ever worn
According to several reviews, the Merrell Jungle Ayers Mocs are a joy to wear because of the “great” arch support they provide
These sneakers from Merrell look and feel durable, some purchasers claim
A handful of buyers find the shoes to be well-built
A few people have remarked positively upon the casual, laidback style of the Merrell Jungle Ayers Moc shoes
The cushioning of the shoes feels just right and is noticeable when walking, a couple of consumers have found
It’s easy to step into the shoes, a small number of people have attested
cons: Merrell Jungle Ayers Mocs run small and narrow according to many reviewers
The shoes need to be broken in, a handful of individuals have reported

customer_reviews.title: nice looking shoe, but not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other lightweight soft soled shoes, this one is good looking. Please keep this in mind when ordering, however * this shoe runs a bit narrow and small * the toe bed is wider than many shoes so if the mid part of your shoe is narrow but you have a wide toebed, then this shoe will work, likely * i wear a size 14 shoe, and the size 14 for this specific shoe is one of the smaller 14s ive ever had. If there was a size 15 in this exact shoe, i would get it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lightweight casuals
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my father as a quick throw-on for around the house. Never meant for them to be his main shoe, but thats pretty much what they became. He's hard to impress, too. I've trusted Merrell as my go-to brand for a few years now. (their work boots are excellent) can't beat their build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D Zielinski

customer_reviews.title: great price and not made of animals
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for vegan shoes that I could wear to work. Merrell is a good company, and was happy to find this pair. a lot of non-leather shoes are either plastic leather that does not breathe and makes my feet sweat, or super expensive. These fit great (I am a true 10.5 but ordered the 11 after reading the reviews) and I prefer the slip-ons. Wish they had more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Two different shoes
customer_reviews.text: While both shoes fit, they were two different sizes (even though the labeling both had them at 9.5). I thought maybe I needed to stretch one in; I should have followed my initial instinct and returned them. Ironically, I had purchased these in another color and they were fine, but in general I've experienced some QC issues with Merrell and am not likely to every buy another pair from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Toddster64

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe,length right on, bit narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe with nice weight and aggressive tread pattern. Length perfect but width a bit narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B. Netwal

customer_reviews.title: Designed to be too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a Merrill 10.5 Medium, but these are too tight. Like -- put-them-on-and-know-right-away-they-will-be-a-problem-tight. Take them off and two feet shout: Thank You for Removing Them. Merrill must have changed their sizing pattern, but these are just wrong. Had to return. So if you are borderline medium, consider a WIDE instead.
customer_reviews.author: Northwest ELF

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FIT AS EXPECTED
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping arrived exceptionally fast. Great looking , lightweight and a perfect fit. Merrill shoes always fit me perfectly, never a compromise in comfort. This pair fits so well and is so perfect for summer I will order another pair in lighter color.
customer_reviews.author: wayne b

customer_reviews.title: Super light weight, summer shoes- look great
customer_reviews.text: Super light, easy on/off so great going through airports. Nice fit when you need to run while traveling to catch a connection. Looks great in jeans or casual pants. Great in hot climate - not warm- wind cuts thru them. Went on a early morning safari with temp in low 50’s and feet got a little chilly.
customer_reviews.author: Salil S. Soman

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: After several months of use, these are my favorite "pull-on-and-go" shoes! They are wearing very well, and have become even more comfortable with use. I have been very happy with Merrell in the past, and these shoes continue my brand loyalty! I highly recommend them, and would definitely buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Dan H. Kellar

customer_reviews.title: Great Slip-On that doesn’t feel like one!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Merrells for almost 20 years and have not been disappointed. This is no exception, the Ayers jungle Moc fits perfect and is consistent with my previous Mocs in sizing and feel. Good arch support and traction! It’s tough to beat, especially for a slip on. If you get the right size for your feet, it doesn’t feel like a slip-on shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Comfy! Narrow heel, big toe box
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and very comfortable. Fit has changed since the two pairs I bought last year. Had to buy a half size up last year. Current pair is a half size narrow in the heel but wide in the toe box. I still love them. Had my doubts about durability of the sole but my last pair held up for an impressive number of miles.
customer_reviews.author: Woodsman

customer_reviews.title: Fits like all the other Merrells I've bought
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is a lot lighter and softer than the other Merrells I've bought but the material is good and will last a long time (perhaps indefinitely as an indoor shoe). I've seen complaints about size (going in either direction) but I suspect they didn't find out how Merrell shoes fit them beforehand. Their sizes are consistent: just go to a brick and mortar store that carries Merrells, try them there to find your size, and then order them on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ian T.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace other Merrell shoes I wore out. They are a little tight around the top of my feet, but that might soften with wear.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Merrell Jungle Ayers mock in canvas.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking canvas shoe for casual wear. Light airy breathes well for Florida. Very comfortable feels good.Some reviews indicated needed to get a size larger. So I did and had to return. I guess if you have a wide foot that maybe good advice, if regular sizing the length fit good width could be a hair bit wider.
customer_reviews.author: Victor J. Carro

customer_reviews.title: Can't use arch support inserts with this shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I use inserts for flat feet in all my shoes. You can't do that with these shoes as (1) existing under is not removable, and (2: the fit is so tight you can't place a custom inset over it and still get your foot in the shoe. I tried using them as is for 2 mile walks andtheyonly got tighter as my feet expanded during the walk. This is a cheap shoe. It's not like the higher priced Merrells I've purchased. These are headed for St. Vincent Dr Paul.
customer_reviews.author: javajon

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are the lightest shoes I’ve ever worn. It feels like your barefoot without the pain.
customer_reviews.author: eodman

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy shoes.  Not up to Merrill standards
customer_reviews.text: Long time merrell fan but was disappointed in these. Wouldn’t have lasted a week. Very flimsy construction. They are light, but that’s the only compliment I can muster.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Merrell shoes always quality
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had purchase 2 pair when I ordered this shoe. They exceed my expectations. Walking in them is not a challenge. The shoes stay on my feet even at a run.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not ok
customer_reviews.text: Smaller then expected. Not sure on support etc but very light and flimsy feel.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight and Fun to Wear
customer_reviews.text: I really like how they feel "fun to wear." At first they feel too tight, but then they feel "just right" as you walk in these novel shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Social

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as an in house shoe. I had the older model from the previous brand merrell bought and that was a large reason I bought these. They are a bit more supported and firm but also a little narrow as others said. But not too much. All in all I enjoy them but not completely head over heels.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased these shoes... he is very particular. He liked the Merrell Moccasin so much he ordered a second pair. He loves the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Ayers Moc.
customer_reviews.text: These look good on your feet, and get more comfortable as the day goes on. They fit a bit more snug, compared to Merrill’s Jungle Moc.
customer_reviews.author: Faja Gentrup

customer_reviews.title: Too tight..
customer_reviews.text: I wear a Jungle Moc at 9.5 medium and I cant fit my foot in this shoe.. If I could order a wide with I would try that. Merrill is a quality shoe, too bad the sizing was differant than the other Merrills that I have purchased over the years..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Too Narrow
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, but I'm a little confused by the width. They seem narrower than in year's past. I got an M size. is there a wider version that I'm missing?
customer_reviews.author: SpenserFan

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Too small, had to return. I wear a 9 1/2 or a 10, ordered a 10, couldn't get them on.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald C.

customer_reviews.title: Order One Size Larger
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe. Especially for the money. Just order one size larger. Had to return mine.
customer_reviews.author: Gary DeVincenzo

customer_reviews.title: Soft counter
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe for money but counter is soft and wants to roll. A loop might be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L. Suesz

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, but the sole wears pretty quickly and sometimes squeaks
customer_reviews.text: It's a comfortable and light shoe, but after about a month or so of wearing it, it started to squeak when I walked. Also, the soul feels like it's wearing pretty quickly compared to other Merrell shoes that I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Very Narrow
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a 3 star because it looked nice and was easy to return. I have no idea about the feel of the shoe because I came nowhere near to getting it on. I wear a 14 but don't require a wide size. This wasn't even close.
customer_reviews.author: George Schuster

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Very comfy. A bit small at first but after a few wears fit perfect. Very happy and will be biying again.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good office shoe.. channeling Mr. Rogers
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. I am using it as an office shoe for the winter. It would get uncomfortable if I walked a long way in them
customer_reviews.author: mamrev

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Tight, hard to slip on and off. Sort of cheap. Light weight.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hen

customer_reviews.title: Wearable slip on
customer_reviews.text: Its a slip on you can beat the crap out of it and it's ok
customer_reviews.author: woody

customer_reviews.title: Fit well
customer_reviews.text: My husband is kinda picky about shoes. He has bought two pairs of these.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Ahhh! Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes I have ever owned! I wear them everyday
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Henry

customer_reviews.title: Arch is too tight and fits very differently than the regular Moc
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and a pair of the regular Jungle Mocs at the exact same time, and the same size. These canvas mocs have a very tight and uncomfortable fit across the arch of the foot, and the sole feels narrower and less stable than the mocs. There's a reason these are cheaper, and I won't make the mistake of buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great relaxation shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these for lounging around or even on the golf course. Hate that this style appears to be discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Harbour

customer_reviews.title: Just right for me.
customer_reviews.text: I love the square toe front, much better than sneakers. Fits perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Confortable like no other, Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoes the color as expected and confortable like no other I had, and really confortable to use then and been around a great chooice
customer_reviews.author: Hector Alejandro Flores Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable slip ons
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. Too bad Merrill isn’t making them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Wooden

customer_reviews.title: New favorite comfy shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I wear Sketchers canvas type shoes like these almost every day. These have a bit more bounce to them and I like it.
customer_reviews.author: BCL

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was extremely not to size chart. They fit extremely small.
customer_reviews.author: KIMBER

customer_reviews.title: Yup
customer_reviews.text: Light, comfy, durable, stylish, everything you would expect from Merrell
customer_reviews.author: Jim B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for lazy people!
customer_reviews.text: Being lazy I like the fact don’t have to lace up my shoes. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Tj

customer_reviews.title: Not comparable to leather version
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable. Based on the classic jungle moc, i expected a much more comfortable shoe from Merrell. I was going to return but missed the window by a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Hall family

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing Merrell shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of merrell shoes but this is just way off from the usual merrelle shoes. Poor Arch and Heel support. Got sore feet after a long walk.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo Cajucom

customer_reviews.title: Merrell
customer_reviews.text: My first pair. I haven't worn them outside yet, but the shoe is nice, good looking and makes me look like a 10.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow
customer_reviews.text: Length was fine, as I normally wear a 9.5, but the shoe is narrow and very tight on the top of my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Michales

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. They have a great look, they're easy to slip on and off, and they feel really comfortable. The only problem is the soles wear down pretty quick. I've already gone through one pair.
customer_reviews.author: ivan

customer_reviews.title: Very Small
customer_reviews.text: Very small. I’m size 12, they are a couple sizes smaller. Could not put them on.
customer_reviews.author: scott f

customer_reviews.title: small over instep
customer_reviews.text: could not get my foot even close to going in. the shoe was large enough on the sole, but the opening to put your foot into the shoe was way too small and would not stretch. that seems to be a common complaint on there shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R Goss

customer_reviews.title: Actual size much smaller that stated size.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe felt good, although was too small, support seemed good.
customer_reviews.author: UPsnowrider

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I have wider feet, usually a 11d will fit but these were way too small, and they are a size 12.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O.

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Liked them so much I purchased a second pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: hoddyburch

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: Dislike: marginal quality. Upper is thin...not impressed. Expected more from Merrell.
customer_reviews.author: scott hawes

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Two sizes too small Says 12 but about 10. Very thin material. Looks cheap
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Narrow Toe Box
customer_reviews.text: If you have narrow feet, make sure to order the wide option if they have it!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: they look really nice..
customer_reviews.text: they look really nice... the sole is comfortable but they are a little tight around the mid-bridge of the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Fouad Halbouni

customer_reviews.title: Style on the go!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Taking a walk around the neighborhood, running to the store for wearing them around the house I love the fit and styling of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Pack
customer_reviews.text: Casual style. Very comfortable. I walked all day. No problems
customer_reviews.author: Tony Chelpaty

product_meta.title: Merrell Men's Jungle Ayers Moc Moccasin
product_meta.description: The Merrell® Jungle Ayers Moc shoe offers superior comfort and style for all-day wear. Canvas upper. Vegan-friendly construction. Slip-on design. Breathable mesh lining. Lightly cushioned integrated footbed for excellent underfoot comfort and support. Well-cushioned EVA midsole provides daylong comfort and stability. High-abrasion outsole for long-lasting durability and excellent traction. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 7 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11, width M. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
